amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 115-766 to direct HHS to issue guidelines for prescribing naloxone in situations involving any type of prescription or illicit opioid use.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Keating.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
